mapper.insert: INSERT INTO simpleboard_board (username, password, category, title, detail, writedate, last_edited_date, writeip, last_edited_ip) VALUES (#{username},#{password},#{category}, #{title}, #{detail}, #{writedate}, #{lastEditedDate}, #{writeip}, #{lastEditedIp})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, title, writedate FROM simpleboard_board ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{PAGINATION}, #{LIMIT}
SELECT id, username, title, writedate FROM simpleboard_board
SELECT id, username, title, hit, comment_cnt ,writedate FROM simpleboard_board WHERE category = #{category} AND visible = 1 AND isannounce = 1 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM simpleboard_board WHERE category = #{category}
SELECT count(id) FROM simpleboard_board WHERE category = #{category} AND isannounce = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE simpleboard_board SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, category = #{category}, title = #{title}, detail = #{detail} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE simpleboard_board SET comment_cnt = comment_cnt + 1 WHERE id = #{boardId}
UPDATE simpleboard_board SET comment_cnt = comment_cnt - 1 WHERE id = #{boardId}
UPDATE simpleboard_board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE id = #{boardId}
